name: SCAVENGERS
summary: SCAVENGERS brings the excitement and unpredictability of class-based teambuilding to its unique blend of competitive and cooperative survival gameplay. Every round is a perfect puzzle for you and your team to unlock together.
info:
• 开发: Midwinter Entertainment
  • 游戏类型: multiplayer survival shooter
  • 官方网站: https://scavengersgame.com/
